amendatorysection.catchline: Department; seal; rules and regulations; adopt; fiscal year.
amendatorysection.para: The department shall, within thirty days after its creation, adopt a seal and make such rules and regulations for its administration, not inconsistent herewith, as it may deem expedient. It may, from time to time, amend such rules and regulations. The fiscal year of the department shall conform to the fiscal year of the state.

crossreference.para: For promulgation of administrative rules, see Chapter 84, article 9.

annotation.para: Department of Aeronautics has power to adopt rules and regulations in conformity, as nearly as may be, with federal regulations. In re Estate of Kinsey, 152 Neb. 95, 40 N.W.2d 526 (1949).
